chlorine.name: Chlorine
safety_precautions: Wear protective gloves and eye protection
Do not mix with other chemicals
chlorine.storage_guidelines: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and other chemicals.
chlorine.emergency_procedures: In case of skin contact, rinse with plenty of water. If inhaled, move to fresh air. Seek medical attention if irritation persists.

muriatic_acid.name: Muriatic Acid
safety_precautions: Wear chemical-resistant gloves, eye protection, and protective clothing
Always add acid to water, never water to acid
muriatic_acid.storage_guidelines: Store in original container in a cool, dry place away from metals and other chemicals.
muriatic_acid.emergency_procedures: In case of skin contact, rinse with plenty of water for at least 15 minutes. If inhaled, move to fresh air. Seek immediate medical attention.

sodium_bicarbonate.name: Sodium Bicarbonate
sodium_bicarbonate.storage_guidelines: Store in a cool, dry place in a sealed container.
sodium_bicarbonate.emergency_procedures: In case of eye contact, rinse with water. If inhaled, move to fresh air.
